title: How I Miss You
lyrics:
[Intro]
How I miss you
How I miss you
How I miss you
I should never call
How I hope that you still miss me
[Verse 1]
Did I lose you
Did I lose you
Did I lose you
Somewhere down the line
Hide & seeks alright if I find
[Verse 2]
Do you miss me
Like I miss you
If you miss me
Never go away
Hopefully, you'll come stay someday
[Bridge]
If you're leaving
Come back soon
That's not easy to say

[Outro]
I'll wait here
Dream of you
All alone as I ache
